title: Calls from PIXEL 4A using wired microphones, the mic on the headphones is picking up the sound
content:
I'm experiencing the exact same symptoms as this issue for the pixel 3a: https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/37070488

When using wired headphones (TRRS specifically)  I can hear the scratching of the mic and some ambient noise feeding back into the headphones.

Seems this wasn't ever addressed in the pixel 3a and the problem persists to the 4a.
